## Activities day 2!

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
```

A. find the slope of f(x) = x\^2 at x = 3

B. find the slope of P(a) = 2(3a + 2)\^4 - 5 at a = 1.2

```{r}

#A

fx <- expression(x^2)
x <- 2
D(fx, 'x')
```

```{r}
pa <- expression(2 * ((3 * a + 2)^4) - 5)
a <- 1.2
D(pa, 'a')
```
